Name: Kneeling Statue Holding Plinth with Ram's Head
Description: This elegant masterpiece of Egyptian art depicts Horemhy kneeling and holding a plinth, or slab, surmounted by a ram's head. A relief shows the sistrum, or rattle, of Hathor on the front face of the plinth while on its sides there is a hieroglyphic text. Horemhy is dressed in a puff dress with wide sleeves. He wears on his head a beautiful wig covering the tops of his ears; a figure of Osiris is engraved on his chest.
